job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the act of creating and building new technological solutions, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI capabilities developed by our data scientists and ML engineers with traditional software engineering practices
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the role of combining AI components with standard software engineering to create products.

job_tasks.phrase: build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio
job_tasks.justification: This describes the outcome of the development work, focusing on creating end-user or platform-integrated products.

job_tasks.phrase: providing a state-of-the-art centralized platform around generative AI
job_tasks.justification: The description focuses on a platform built around generative AI, implying the development and integration of such models.

job_tasks.phrase: Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions working with LLMs and NLP, which falls under the modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: preparing the data for our inference engine
job_tasks.justification: Data preparation for an inference engine is a crucial step in the modeling process, specifically for making models operational.

job_tasks.phrase: A custom-built CMS customers can use to easily manage the data in their knowledge base
job_tasks.justification: Building a Content Management System (CMS) is a software development task aimed at managing data.

job_tasks.phrase: A custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user
job_tasks.justification: Developing an inference engine that processes user input is a significant software engineering undertaking.

job_tasks.phrase: to fully service our customers' use-cases
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of customer needs and how the technology serves those business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring the scalability and reliability of our existing platform
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on scalability and reliability of a platform often involves operational aspects of deploying and maintaining systems, which aligns with MLOps principles.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with generative AI, Large Language Models, and NLP concepts. It also focuses on building and integrating these AI capabilities into user-facing platforms and custom inference engines, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
